entry.title: Dakota Morrell
entry.personShortBio: Dakota joined Legatum in 2020 as an Investment Analyst, moving from J.P. Morgan in New York
entry.personFullBiography:
Dakota Morrell is an Investment Analyst at Legatum, responsible for helping Legatum Capital with research and investment diligence.

Prior to joining Legatum in 2020, Dakota was an Investment Banking Analyst at J.P. Morgan, based in New York.

Dakota holds a Bachelor’s Degree with Distinction in Commerce from the University of Virginia, McIntire School of Commerce.

entry.title: Legatum Capital

metaImage.title: Legatum Capital: part of the Legatum Portfolio

entry.metaDescription: Legatum Capital invests in well-run businesses across a range of sectors, primarily focusing on consumer, technology and financial services
